item.title: Get Assured
item.description: Summary: GetAssured is Singapore’s first life insurance based employee benefits portal. It provides a platform for companies to help their employees look for the best value life insurance products. • Implement multi-tenancy functionality to the GetAssured platform to create a unique site experience for each individual business clients. • Design and Convert the platform’s front end into React.js framework in order to facilitate future improvements as well as enhance customer’s experience.
